info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 8 at 1:53PM CDT until July 8 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
info.description:
* WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of southeast Texas, including the following county, Harris.
* WHEN...Until 345 PM CDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 153 PM CDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Humble, Aldine, Northside / Northline, Greater Greenspoint, Kingwood, East Little York / Homestead, Bush Intercontinental Airport, Eastex / Jensen Area, Houston Gardens, Hidden Valley, East Houston, Independence Heights, southeastern Acres Home and Central Northwest. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON
